mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS R , N.* FROM NOTICE N ORDER BY NO ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}
SELECT COUNT(NO) AS COUNT FROM NOTICE

SELECT N.NO , N.CATEGORY_NO , C.TITLE AS CATEGORY , N.WRITER_NO , M.NICK , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , TO_CHAR(N.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DATE , TO_CHAR(N.MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DATE , N.HITS FROM NOTICE N JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.NO = N.CATEGORY_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON M.NO = N.WRITER_NO WHERE N.NO = #{no}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.* ,ROWNUM R FROM ( SELECT N.NO, N.CATEGORY_NO AS CATEGORY_NO, C.TITLE AS CATEGORY, N.WRITER_NO, N.TITLE, N.CONTENT, TO_CHAR(N.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS ENROLL_DATE, TO_CHAR(N.MODIFY_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS MODIFY_DATE FROM NOTICE N JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.NO = N.CATEGORY_NO WHERE N.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND (N.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR N.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%') ORDER BY CASE
WHEN N.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' THEN 1 ELSE 2
WHEN N.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' THEN 2 ELSE 1
END, N.ENROLL_DATE DESC ) A ) WHERE R BETWEEN #{startNo} AND #{endNo}

SELECT COUNT(R) FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM R FROM ( SELECT N.NO FROM NOTICE N JOIN CATEGORY C ON C.NO = N.CATEGORY_NO WHERE N.CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo} AND (N.TITLE LIKE '%${searchValue}%' OR N.CONTENT LIKE '%${searchValue}%') ) A )
